donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr:
The MDG-based planning programme is a partnership between the Ministry of Development Planning and Cooperation and United Nations Development Programme (UNDP), with the objective to support Malawi achieve the MGDS and the MDGs targets. The project is designed to provide technical and financial support to Government to institutionalize the MDGs within the MGDS.  The project has the following outputs: 
- Capacity development of sectoral planning staff in MDG-based costing and related processes
- MDGs and MGDS awareness and knowledge increased among key policy makers and implementers 
- MGDS (2006-2011) reviewed and support given to improve the MGDS II implementation and costing framework
